config.permanentsnow.title: PermanentSnow Configuration
config.permanentsnow.precipitation.group: Configure precipitation types to render as other precipitation types.
What precipitation should be rendered when there would be none?
What precipitation should be rendered when it would rain?
What precipitation should be rendered when it would snow?

The higher the level of precipitation, the more intense the precipitation will be.
